CSSUnitValue.summary: The CSSUnitValue interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents values that contain a single unit type. For example, "42px" would be represented by a CSSNumericValue.

CSSUnitValueCSSUnitValue.summary:
The CSSUnitValue() constructor creates a
new object which returns a new
object which represents values that contain a single unit type. For example, "42px"
would be represented by a CSSNumericValue.

remarks.para:
-
-
-Using the CSS Typed OM
-CSS Typed Object Model API

CSSUnitValueUnit.summary:
The CSSUnitValue.unit read-only property
of the interface returns a string
indicating the type of unit.

remarks.para:
-
-Dimensions in CSS values and units
-Using the CSS Typed OM
-CSS Typed Object Model API

CSSUnitValueValue.summary:
The CSSUnitValue.value property of the
interface returns a double indicating the number of units.

remarks.para:
-
-Using the CSS Typed OM
-CSS Typed Object Model API
